record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2318
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2318 -- (Senate - November 08, 2007)

[Page: S14106]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, S. 2318 is at the desk. I ask for its second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title for the second time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 2318) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the individual alternative minimum tax and to permanently extend the reductions in income tax rates, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings at this time.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
